metadata.description: A twisted, nightmarish landscape of broken spires and shattered minarets, where the ruins of a ancient city pierce the sky like jagged teeth. The air is thick with an otherworldly mist that seems to writhe and twist in the flickering torchlight.
metadata.significance: The Shattered Spires are the remnants of the ancient Eldorian metropolis, said to hold secrets of the world's downfall and the source of the mysterious energy known as 'The Devouring'.
